question_text: A company has an ecommerce site that requires storage and retrieval of unstructured customer metadata to support one of its microservices. Which database option is best suited to store this data?

answers.answer_text: Amazon RDS
Amazon Redshift
Amazon Aurora
Amazon DynamoDB

question_text: Which statement reflects a design principle of the Security pillar of the AWS Well-Architected Framework?

answers.answer_text: Don't deploy a solution to production until you're certain that there are no security risks.
Ensure that staff are actively monitoring potential risks manually.
Apply security at all layers of an architecture.
Decentralize permissions management.

question_text: What is the relationship between AWS Regions, Availability Zones, and data centers?

answers.answer_text: Each Region has locations called Availability Zones. Each Availability Zone has data centers.
Each Availability Zone includes data centers. Each data center in an Availability Zone is located in a different geographical Region.
A set of data centers in a geographical area create a Region. Availability Zones are connections between Regions.
Each Region has a set of data centers. Each data center maps to one Availability Zone.

question_text: Which scenario describes a use case for AWS CloudTrail?

answers.answer_text: An account administrator wants to centrally control access permissions for groups of accounts.
A systems administrator wants to protect their web application from denial of service attacks.
A developer wants to control user logins to their website.
An account administrator wants the ability to track user activity on their account.

question_text: Which option describes a capability of Amazon virtual private clouds (VPCs)?

answers.answer_text: They can be configured as a physically isolated section of the AWS Cloud.
They can have the address range changed as desired after creation.
They can span Availability Zones.
They can belong to multiple AWS Regions.

question_text: Which statement accurately describes a content delivery network (CDN)?

answers.answer_text: A CDN caches frequently requested files.
A CDN creates fast connections between origin servers.
A CDN speeds up domain name resolution for application servers.
A CDN is a Regional group of servers.

question_text: Which statement about Amazon Elastic Block Store (Amazon EBS) is true?

answers.answer_text: Amazon EBS volumes are automatically replicated across multiple Availability Zones.
Amazon EBS volumes aren't recommended for storage that requires frequent updating.
Amazon EBS volumes persist independently from the Amazon EC2 instances that they're attached to.
Amazon EBS volumes can't be resized.

question_text: Which pieces of information MUST be configured for the Amazon EC2 instances that will be part of an Amazon EC2 Auto Scaling group? (Select TWO).

answers.answer_text: ID of an Amazon Machine Image (AMI)
Amazon EC2 instance type
Amazon EC2 Auto Scaling group metrics
Network access control list (ACL)
Storage volume
